ing: 1 tablespoon chili oil, or as needed
des: "Sorghum popped in chili oil is a new twist on spicy popcorn. Add a little cinnamon and sugar for a sweet and savory treat."
ins: Heat chili oil in a pot over medium heat; add sorghum and cover pot. Cook, shaking constantly, until the majority of sorghum is popped, about 5 minutes. Season with salt.
